long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Linki is an extension that helps the user to generate short links on the spot, where the new link generate is smaller and is redirected through our website linki.ai which allows us to generate statistics for the link for our users to better understand their business needs.
